data.title: Movie: House of Games
data.meta_description: A psychiatrist comes to the aid of a compulsive gambler and is led by a smooth-talking grifter into the shadowy but compelling world of stings, scams, and con men.
data.text:
House of Games (1987)

January 6, 2017 7:53 PM - Subscribe

A psychiatrist comes to the aid of a compulsive gambler and is led by a smooth-talking grifter into the shadowy but compelling world of stings, scams, and con men.

About FanFare

FanFare is a pop culture discussion site for TV, movies, podcasts, and books. Any MetaFilter member can post a thread about a piece of media for other members to discuss.
